comment: general reaction (see R02211, R03783, R04852 and R04853) P-450 reductase (ec 1.6.2.4) is the acceptor and re-reduced by NADPH (see R08551)
definition: Steroid + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 17alpha-Hydroxysteroid + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: steroid,NADPH-hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (17alpha-hydroxylating)
